title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 224.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 224.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to any transaction or recommendation with respect to a proposed or in-force policy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
224.1

Amended

New

York State Register August 1, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 31, eff. 8/1/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
